sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' const ShopItemFunc = (props) => { const {brand,title,description,descriptionFull,price,currency} = props; console.log(price) return (

{brand}

{title}

{description}

{descriptionFull}
{currency}{price? price.toFixed(2): undefined}
) } ShopItemFunc.propTypes = { brand: PropTypes.string.isRequired, title: PropTypes.string.isRequired, description: PropTypes.string, descriptionFull: PropTypes.string, price: PropTypes.number, currency: PropTypes.oneOf(["£","$","€","¥"]), } ShopItemFunc.defaultProps = { description: "description is not available", descriptionFull: "description is not available now", } export default ShopItemFunc
